M. Pusa

dcterms:description: Data generated using the Serpent Monte Carlo code to calculate neutronic quantities associated with a heat-pipe microreactor design, including drum positions, core criticality, and core power distribution.
dcterms:title: Serpent model data

dcterms:creator: K.-C. Kwon
P. Jae-Chang
J. Chul-Hwan
L. Jang-Soo
J.-Y. Kim
dcterms:description: Data from the Korea Atomic Energy Research Institute’s compact nuclear simulator, representing the APR-1400 reactor within certain operating parameters, used for training reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Korea Atomic Energy Research Institute’s compact nuclear simulator data

dcterms:creator: J. Park
T. Kim
S. Seong
S. Koo
dcterms:description: Data from a study on the A2C reinforcement learning algorithm applied to control automation in the heat-up mode of a nuclear power plant.
dcterms:title: Data from the study by Park et al. on A2C RL algorithm

dcterms:creator: J. Bae
J. M. Kim
S. J. Lee
dcterms:description: Data from a study on the soft actor-critic reinforcement learning algorithm for multi-objective operation in a nuclear power plant.
dcterms:title: Data from the study by Bae et al. on soft actor-critic RL algorithm

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
A. Ray
dcterms:description: Data from a study on deep reinforcement learning control of a boiling water reactor using a deep deterministic policy gradient algorithm.
dcterms:title: Data from the study by Chen et al. on deep deterministic policy gradient
